thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Macquarie Group Ltd Says Bank CET1 Ratio 11.0% As At March 31

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Macquarie Group Ltd Says Bank CET1 Ratio 11.0% As At March 31
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Macquarie Group Ltd:
* AS AT MARCH 31, BANK CET1 RATIO 11.0% * GROUP’S RESULT FOR FY19 IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE BROADLY IN LINE WITH FY18
* MACQUARIE’S SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAM REMAINS IN PLACE * INTENDS TO REDEEM MACQUARIE GROUP CAPITAL NOTES (MCN) $600 MILLION HYBRID IN JUNE 2018
* INTENDS TO BUY SHARES TO SATISFY MEREP REQUIREMENTS OF APPROXIMATE VALUE $460 MILLION; BUYING PERIOD FOR MEREP WILL START ON MAY 14
* OFFER OF MACQUARIE GROUP CAPITAL NOTES 3 HYBRID SECURITIES WILL BE LAUNCHED SHORTLY
* UNDER SHARE BUYBACK, NO BUYING OCCURRED DURING 2H18 Source text for Eikon:
Our
